info.name: Online Learning Platform API - Complete Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for the Online Learning Platform with all endpoints including authentication, courses, lessons, live classes, tests, educators, progress tracking, subscriptions, doubts, materials, search, and reviews.

request.description: This request uses the name field for registration (name-splitting supported by backend).

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Dr. Sarah Kumar",
  "email": "sarah@example.com",
  "password": "securePassword123",
  "mobile": "+919876543211",
  "subjects": ["Mathematics", "Physics"],
  "qualification": "PhD in Physics, IIT Delhi",
  "experience": 8,
  "bio": "8+ years of teaching experience..."
}

request.description: Login endpoint for learners. Returns a JWT token for learner role.
Login endpoint for educators. Returns a JWT token for educator role.

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific course including syllabus, features, educator details, and reviews.

response.name: Success

variable.description: ID of the course to enroll in

request.description:
Enroll the authenticated learner in the specified course. Requires a valid learner token. Returns 409 if already enrolled.

**URL Parameters:**
- courseId: ID of the course to enroll in

**Headers:**
- Authorization: Bearer token (required)
- Content-Type: application/json

**Response Codes:**
- 201: Successfully enrolled
- 409: Already enrolled
- 404: Course not found
- 401: Unauthorized
- 403: Forbidden (not a learner)

response.name: Already Enrolled

request.description: Get details of a lesson, including progress and navigation. Requires enrollment and a valid learner token.

response.name: Success

request.description:
Update lesson progress for a learner. Requires authentication and enrollment.

Request body fields:
- watchedDuration (number, seconds)
- totalDuration (number, seconds)
- status (string: 'not_started', 'in_progress', 'completed')
- timeSpent (number, seconds)

Status must be one of 'not_started', 'in_progress', or 'completed'.
Save a note for a lesson. Requires authentication and enrollment. Both 'note' (string) and 'timestamp' (number) are required in the request body.

item.name: Get Live Class Schedule with Filters
